mapper.sql: id , receiver , user_id , content , status , gmt_resend , send_times , gmt_modified , gmt_create , sms_config_id , properties , biz_id , ack_code , gmt_his_create , gmt_send_success , ack_code_validate_count , send_result , send_channel , send_sub_channel , ack_code_validate_try_count , send_channel_specified , resend_from_id , sms_id , template_args , unique_id , app_code
mapper.select: select id, receiver, user_id, content, status, gmt_resend, send_times, gmt_modified, gmt_create, sms_config_id, properties, biz_id, ack_code, gmt_his_create, gmt_send_success, ack_code_validate_count, send_result, send_channel, send_sub_channel, ack_code_validate_try_count, send_channel_specified, resend_from_id, sms_id, unique_id, template_args, app_code from gtc_sms_out_his where (id = #{id})

select id, receiver, user_id, content, status, gmt_resend, send_times, gmt_modified, gmt_create, sms_config_id, properties, biz_id, ack_code, gmt_his_create, gmt_send_success, ack_code_validate_count, send_result, send_channel, send_sub_channel, ack_code_validate_try_count, send_channel_specified, resend_from_id, sms_id, unique_id, template_args, app_code from gtc_sms_out_his where (sms_id = #{smsId})

select id, receiver, user_id, content, status, gmt_resend, send_times, gmt_modified, gmt_create, sms_config_id, properties, biz_id, ack_code, gmt_his_create, gmt_send_success, ack_code_validate_count,send_result,send_channel,send_sub_channel,ack_code_validate_try_count,send_channel_specified,resend_from_id,sms_id,unique_id,template_args,app_code from gtc_sms_out_his where id in #{item}

select id, receiver, user_id, content, status, gmt_resend, send_times, gmt_modified, gmt_create, sms_config_id, properties, biz_id, ack_code, gmt_his_create, gmt_send_success, ack_code_validate_count, send_result, send_channel, send_sub_channel, ack_code_validate_try_count, send_channel_specified, resend_from_id, sms_id, unique_id, template_args, app_code from gtc_sms_out_his where (user_id = #{userId}) order by gmt_send_success DESC

select id, receiver, user_id, content, status, gmt_resend, send_times, gmt_modified, gmt_create, sms_config_id, properties, biz_id, ack_code, gmt_his_create, gmt_send_success, ack_code_validate_count,send_result,send_channel,send_sub_channel,ack_code_validate_try_count,send_channel_specified,resend_from_id,sms_id,unique_id,template_args,app_code from gtc_sms_out_his and receiver=#{receiver} and user_id=#{userId} and status=#{status} order by gmt_his_create desc,id desc

select * from (select id, receiver, user_id, content, status, gmt_resend, send_times, gmt_modified, gmt_create, sms_config_id, properties, biz_id, ack_code, gmt_his_create, gmt_send_success, ack_code_validate_count,send_result,send_channel,send_sub_channel,ack_code_validate_try_count,send_channel_specified,resend_from_id,sms_id,unique_id,template_args,app_code from gtc_sms_out_his o where status in ('I','S') and biz_id=#{bizId} and sms_config_id=#{smsConfigId} and (ack_code_validate_count=0 and ack_code_validate_try_count < (select max_try_count from gtc_sms_config where id=o.sms_config_id)) and gmt_create >=now() - (select INTERVAL_SECONDS from gtc_sms_config where id=o.sms_config_id)/86400 order by gmt_create desc ) tmp limit 0,1

select * from (select id, receiver, user_id, content, status, gmt_resend, send_times, gmt_modified, gmt_create, sms_config_id, properties, biz_id, ack_code, gmt_his_create, gmt_send_success, ack_code_validate_count,send_result,send_channel,send_sub_channel,ack_code_validate_try_count,send_channel_specified,resend_from_id,sms_id,unique_id,template_args,app_code from gtc_sms_out_his o where status in ('I','S') and biz_id=#{bizId} and sms_config_id=#{smsConfigId} and gmt_create >=now() - (select INTERVAL_SECONDS from gtc_sms_config where id=o.sms_config_id)/86400 order by gmt_create desc ) tmp limit 0,1
